Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2010 10:03AM rababar wrote: I had a similar problem with orders for a foot draw, but because I'm diabetic, the phlebotomist refused to do the foot draw and after investigation, all agreed that neither arm nor foot was appropriate.  They left my port in for the next year, but I'm wondering what I'll do past that (note the assumption that I'll survive that long!)  I'd  appreciate any info as I have not been able to find anything online.
Posts.Title: How to get a foot draw? moogie TNBCWarrior19
